thread.section_title: Marché Provence Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marché Provence | marcheprovence.com
thread.title: Lola

author: Lola
title: Lola
text: I cannot describe how incredibly helpful the customer service is for Marche Provence! I made a mistake on my order of two gorgeous tablecloths which turned out a bit small for my table. I emailed the company about my mistake and they replied immediately with a solution and sent out the correct sizes the very same day! In a day and age where most shopping experiences make the customer feel barely human and not valued, this felt like a breath of fresh air! Thank you so much to Chuck at Marche Provence! I love my purchase and will certainly order more from you in the future!
